name: Oranguru

passive.name: Instruct
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Forest Fix
attacks.effect: Put up to 3 Pokemon Tools from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Monkey's Paw
attacks.effect: If there are no cards under this Pokemon, put up to 3 cards from your hand under it. Otherwise, return a card under this Pokemon to your hand.

flavor: Sitting around nicely is their favorite.
